slur.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to speak unclearly without separating your words or sounds correctly
slur.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: She was slurring her words as if she was drunk.
slur.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to criticize someone or something unfairly
slur.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to play a group of musical notes smoothly together
slur.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: an unfair criticism that is intended to make people dislike someone or something
slur.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: How dare she cast a slur on  (=criticize) my character?
Milton regarded her comment as a slur on his country.
slur.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a curved line written over musical notes to show they must be played together smoothly
